Vim

Basically getting started with Vim

Background

This is going to be an account/attempt for writing a guide for getting comfortable with this amazing tool we know as Vim

Using Vim!

As of this moment, this is written and edited only using vim. Firstly to anyone reading this, I would strongly recoomend you trying out

vimtutor

If this doesnâ€™t work, either the prompt will tell you that it is not installed, or it would open up a blank vi session. This would mean that you are using an ubuntu system and have vim-tiny which is the default installation of Ubuntu Desktop.

You can fix this by simply installing vim by running the following command in the terminal.

sudo apt install vim
